casebody.data:
In the Matter of K.H. No. 186P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 23, 2008. Beth A. Hall, Attorney Advocate, for Guardian ad Litem. Terry F. Rose, Smithfield, for Stacey Means.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of April 2008 by Petitioners (Cumberland Co. DSS & GAL) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of April 2008."
